ekoran Boatwright was a massive shipyard located in the town of Daggerford during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The building was located in the towns River Quarter, on Hill Road.
Dekorans specialized in the construction of fishing boats, rafts, canoes, and other smaller river-worthy vessels.
While the businesses owner Dekoran sought to build larger ships and compete with the nearby Mikitan Shipyards, he ran into some complications. The adjacent Hill Road, which granted access to the towns dock, was not large enough to navigate larger vessels within its boundaries.
